articles.author: Geoff Graham
articles.description:
This is the best job I've had in my life and it's only possible because you keep showing up each day to read, learn, share, and discuss all-things-front-end (and a little CSS, of course) with us.

articles.author: Daniel Schwarz
articles.description:
The text-decoration-inset property solves a problem that we‚Äôve had since the beginning of the web, which is that text decorations such as underlines extend beyond the first and last characters, resulting in vertical misalignment.
